name: googlecalendar
title: Google Calendar
description: Sync with your calendar to manage events, appointments, and schedules directly within the chatbot.

createEvent.title: Create Event
createEvent.description: Creates a new event in the calendar.

updateEvent.title: Update Event
updateEvent.description: Updates an existing event in the calendar. Omitted properties are left unchanged.

deleteEvent.title: Delete Event
deleteEvent.description: Deletes an event from the calendar.

event.title: Google Calendar Event
event.description: An event in a Google Calendar
